variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-bottleneck
dependencies.description: A collection of fast NumPy array functions written in Cython.

dependencies.name: py-cftime
dependencies.description:
Python library for decoding time units and variable values in a netCDF
file conforming to the Climate and Forecasting (CF) netCDF conventions

dependencies.name: py-dask
dependencies.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: py-numba
dependencies.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm-git-archive
dependencies.description:
This is a setuptools_scm plugin that adds support for git archives (for
example the ones GitHub automatically generates).

dependencies.name: py-toolz
dependencies.description: A set of utility functions for iterators, functions, and dictionaries

dependencies.name: py-xarray
dependencies.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependencies.name: py-xhistogram
dependencies.description: Fast, flexible, label-aware histograms for numpy and xarray.

dependent_to.name: py-earth2mip
dependent_to.description:
Earth-2 Model Intercomparison Project (MIP). A python framework that
enables climate researchers and scientists to explore and experiment
with AI models for weather and climate.
